Gigi Hadid Responds To Troll Who Said Her Relationship With Zayn Is Fake

Picture: Getty/Pascal Le Segretain

By Nicky Idika

Gigi clapped back at a person who claimed her relationship with Zayn for "promo".

Gigi Hadid and Zayn Malik have been romantically linked since late 2015. The model appeared in Zayn's 2016 video for 'PILLOWTALK' and, though the two briefly split earlier this year, Zigi very much appears to be "on" at the moment.

Picture: Instagram Stories/Gigi Hadid

Unfortunately, with every public relationship comes scrutiny and even the odd "fake couple" accusation. Judging from a recent Instagram comment left by Gigi, the 23-year-old model has officially reached her limit with people accusing her and Zayn of being in a showmance.

Gigi has hit back at claims she and Zayn are in a fake relationship, calling the rumours "negative" and saying it would be her "last comment on this matter".

According to the model, an Instagram account dedicated to "exposing" the couple had been tagging Gigi in posts about her and Zayn's romance being for "promo".

Gigi delivered a measured response that even included a declaration of no "hard feelings" toward the person running the account.

Picture: via Gigi Hadid/Instagram

In the ultimate, 'i'm-not-angry-i'm-just-disappointed' move, Gigi wrote "the energy you put into this does not serve your life in any way" and urged the poster to "go out and live". Queen of mature clap backs.

Gigi also stated that she wasn't worried over whether Zayn was following her on Instagram because her eyes are tatted on his chest. Which, I mean, touché, sis.

People backed Gigi's defense of her relationship.

Though, for the record, she shouldn't have to defend it to anyone.

Picture: Twitter/@_leahoconnor

Picture: Twitter/@Shezquad

@GiGiHadid Please don't let stupid internet comments affect your relationship with Zayn, we support you and we love u. 💖 — Inna-Z. 🧪💙🇨🇱 (@zmsickmarvel) July 3, 2018

Keep posting pictures of Zayn, he is your man. The anti zigis are pressed losers who use their spare time to send hate against your beautiful relationship with Zayn. It's beyond pathetic. His real fans appreciate your relationship and respect it 💕 @GiGiHadid — Willow 🍸 (@ZaynxRiri) June 29, 2018

I can’t believe she’s apologizing for defending herself 😭

“Im sorry if it came off immature”

We love you @GiGiHadid ❤️ pic.twitter.com/d5V8eqdBc1 — Zayn&Gigi News (@ZigiFacts) July 3, 2018

In a separate Instagram comment, Gigi also wrote "I've just had enough. Just because I'm a 'celebrity' doesn't mean I don't feel."

Picture: Getty/Pascal Le Segretain

At the end of the day, the only people who know the important details about Zayn and Gigi's relationship are Zayn and Gigi. Anyone spending any real energy on celebrity relationship conspiracies should, in the immortal words of Gigi Hadid, "go outside and live."
